00083 const unsigned char *UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(bTheme *btheme, int spacetype, int colorid)
00084 {
00085     ThemeSpace *ts = NULL;
00086     static char error[4] = {240, 0, 240, 255};
00087     static char alert[4] = {240, 60, 60, 255};
00088     static char headerdesel[4] = {0, 0, 0, 255};
00089     
00090     const char *cp = error;
00091     
00092     if (btheme) {
00093     
00094         // first check for ui buttons theme
00095         if (colorid < TH_THEMEUI) {
00096         
00097             switch (colorid) {
00098 
00099                 case TH_REDALERT:
00100                     cp = alert; break;
00101             }
00102         }
00103         else {
00104         
00105             switch (spacetype) {
00106                 case SPACE_BUTS:
00107                     ts = &btheme->tbuts;
00108                     break;
00109                 case SPACE_VIEW3D:
00110                     ts = &btheme->tv3d;
00111                     break;
00112                 case SPACE_IPO:
00113                     ts = &btheme->tipo;
00114                     break;
00115                 case SPACE_FILE:
00116                     ts = &btheme->tfile;
00117                     break;
00118                 case SPACE_NLA:
00119                     ts = &btheme->tnla;
00120                     break;
00121                 case SPACE_ACTION:
00122                     ts = &btheme->tact;
00123                     break;
00124                 case SPACE_SEQ:
00125                     ts = &btheme->tseq;
00126                     break;
00127                 case SPACE_IMAGE:
00128                     ts = &btheme->tima;
00129                     break;
00130                 case SPACE_TEXT:
00131                     ts = &btheme->text;
00132                     break;
00133                 case SPACE_OUTLINER:
00134                     ts = &btheme->toops;
00135                     break;
00136                 case SPACE_INFO:
00137                     ts = &btheme->tinfo;
00138                     break;
00139                 case SPACE_USERPREF:
00140                     ts = &btheme->tuserpref;
00141                     break;
00142                 case SPACE_CONSOLE:
00143                     ts = &btheme->tconsole;
00144                     break;
00145                 case SPACE_TIME:
00146                     ts = &btheme->ttime;
00147                     break;
00148                 case SPACE_NODE:
00149                     ts = &btheme->tnode;
00150                     break;
00151                 case SPACE_LOGIC:
00152                     ts = &btheme->tlogic;
00153                     break;
00154                 case SPACE_CLIP:
00155                     ts = &btheme->tclip;
00156                     break;
00157                 default:
00158                     ts = &btheme->tv3d;
00159                     break;
00160             }
00161 
00162             switch (colorid) {
00163                 case TH_BACK:
00164                     if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW)
00165                         cp = ts->back;
00166                     else if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_CHANNELS)
00167                         cp = ts->list;
00168                     else if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_HEADER)
00169                         cp = ts->header;
00170                     else
00171                         cp = ts->button;
00172                     break;
00173                 case TH_TEXT:
00174                     if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW)
00175                         cp = ts->text;
00176                     else if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_CHANNELS)
00177                         cp = ts->list_text;
00178                     else if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_HEADER)
00179                         cp = ts->header_text;
00180                     else
00181                         cp = ts->button_text;
00182                     break;
00183                 case TH_TEXT_HI:
00184                     if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW)
00185                         cp = ts->text_hi;
00186                     else if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_CHANNELS)
00187                         cp = ts->list_text_hi;
00188                     else if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_HEADER)
00189                         cp = ts->header_text_hi;
00190                     else
00191                         cp = ts->button_text_hi;
00192                     break;
00193                 case TH_TITLE:
00194                     if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW)
00195                         cp = ts->title;
00196                     else if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_CHANNELS)
00197                         cp = ts->list_title;
00198                     else if (theme_regionid == RGN_TYPE_HEADER)
00199                         cp = ts->header_title;
00200                     else
00201                         cp = ts->button_title;
00202                     break;
00203 
00204                 case TH_HEADER:
00205                     cp = ts->header; break;
00206                 case TH_HEADERDESEL:
00207                     /* we calculate a dynamic builtin header deselect color, also for pulldowns... */
00208                     cp = ts->header;
00209                     headerdesel[0] = cp[0] > 10 ? cp[0] - 10 : 0;
00210                     headerdesel[1] = cp[1] > 10 ? cp[1] - 10 : 0;
00211                     headerdesel[2] = cp[2] > 10 ? cp[2] - 10 : 0;
00212                     cp = headerdesel;
00213                     break;
00214                 case TH_HEADER_TEXT:
00215                     cp = ts->header_text; break;
00216                 case TH_HEADER_TEXT_HI:
00217                     cp = ts->header_text_hi; break;
00218 
00219                 case TH_PANEL:
00220                     cp = ts->panel; break;
00221                 case TH_PANEL_TEXT:
00222                     cp = ts->panel_text; break;
00223                 case TH_PANEL_TEXT_HI:
00224                     cp = ts->panel_text_hi; break;
00225 
00226                 case TH_BUTBACK:
00227                     cp = ts->button; break;
00228                 case TH_BUTBACK_TEXT:
00229                     cp = ts->button_text; break;
00230                 case TH_BUTBACK_TEXT_HI:
00231                     cp = ts->button_text_hi; break;
00232 
00233                 case TH_SHADE1:
00234                     cp = ts->shade1; break;
00235                 case TH_SHADE2:
00236                     cp = ts->shade2; break;
00237                 case TH_HILITE:
00238                     cp = ts->hilite; break;
00239 
00240                 case TH_GRID:
00241                     cp = ts->grid; break;

00243                     cp = ts->wire; break;

00479 /* use this call to init new bone color sets in Theme */
00480 static void ui_theme_init_boneColorSets(bTheme *btheme)
00481 {
00482     int i;
00483     
00484     /* define default color sets - currently we only define 15 of these, though that should be ample */
00485     /* set 1 */
00486     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[0].solid, 0x9a, 0x00, 0x00, 255);
00487     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[0].select, 0xbd, 0x11, 0x11, 255);
00488     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[0].active, 0xf7, 0x0a, 0x0a, 255);
00489     /* set 2 */
00490     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[1].solid, 0xf7, 0x40, 0x18, 255);
00491     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[1].select, 0xf6, 0x69, 0x13, 255);
00492     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[1].active, 0xfa, 0x99, 0x00, 255);
00493     /* set 3 */
00494     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[2].solid, 0x1e, 0x91, 0x09, 255);
00495     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[2].select, 0x59, 0xb7, 0x0b, 255);
00496     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[2].active, 0x83, 0xef, 0x1d, 255);
00497     /* set 4 */
00498     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[3].solid, 0x0a, 0x36, 0x94, 255);
00499     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[3].select, 0x36, 0x67, 0xdf, 255);
00500     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[3].active, 0x5e, 0xc1, 0xef, 255);
00501     /* set 5 */
00502     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[4].solid, 0xa9, 0x29, 0x4e, 255);
00503     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[4].select, 0xc1, 0x41, 0x6a, 255);
00504     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[4].active, 0xf0, 0x5d, 0x91, 255);
00505     /* set 6 */
00506     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[5].solid, 0x43, 0x0c, 0x78, 255);
00507     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[5].select, 0x54, 0x3a, 0xa3, 255);
00508     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[5].active, 0x87, 0x64, 0xd5, 255);
00509     /* set 7 */
00510     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[6].solid, 0x24, 0x78, 0x5a, 255);
00511     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[6].select, 0x3c, 0x95, 0x79, 255);

00515     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[7].select, 0x6a, 0x86, 0x91, 255);

00517     /* set 9 */

00519     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tarm[8].select, 0xee, 0xc2, 0x36, 255);

00521     /* set 10 */

00545     
00546     /* reset flags too */
00547     for (i = 0; i < 20; i++)
00548         btheme->tarm[i].flag = 0;
00549 }

00551 /* use this call to init new variables in themespace, if they're same for all */
00552 static void ui_theme_init_new_do(ThemeSpace *ts)
00553 {
00554     rgba_char_args_test_set(ts->header_text,        0, 0, 0, 255);
00555     rgba_char_args_test_set(ts->header_title,   0, 0, 0, 255);
00556     rgba_char_args_test_set(ts->header_text_hi, 255, 255, 255, 255);
00557

00572 
00573 static void ui_theme_init_new(bTheme *btheme)
00574 {
00575     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tbuts);
00576     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tv3d);
00577     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tfile);
00578     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tipo);
00579     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tinfo);
00580     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tact);
00581     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tnla);
00582     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tseq);
00583     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tima);
00584     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->text);
00585     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->toops);
00586     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->ttime);
00587     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tnode);
00588     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tlogic);
00589     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tuserpref);
00590     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tconsole);
00591     ui_theme_init_new_do(&btheme->tclip);
00592     
00593 }

00596 /* initialize default theme
00597  * Note: when you add new colors, created & saved themes need initialized
00598  * use function below, init_userdef_do_versions()
00599  */
00600 void ui_theme_init_default(void)
00601 {
00602     bTheme *btheme;
00603     
00604     /* we search for the theme with name Default */
00605     for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
00606         if (strcmp("Default", btheme->name) == 0) break;
00607     }
00608     
00609     if (btheme == NULL) {
00610         btheme = MEM_callocN(sizeof(bTheme), "theme");
00611         BLI_addtail(&U.themes, btheme);
00612         strcpy(btheme->name, "Default");
00613     }
00614     
00615     UI_SetTheme(0, 0);  // make sure the global used in this file is set
00616 
00617     /* UI buttons */
00618     ui_widget_color_init(&btheme->tui);
00619     btheme->tui.iconfile[0] = 0;
00620     btheme->tui.panel.show_header = FALSE;
00621     rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tui.panel.header, 0, 0, 0, 25);
00622 
00623     /* Bone Color Sets */
00624     ui_theme_init_boneColorSets(btheme);
00625     
00626     /* common (new) variables */
00627     ui_theme_init_new(btheme);
00628     
00629     /* space view3d */

00869 
00870 
00871 void UI_SetTheme(int spacetype, int regionid)
00872 {
00873     if (spacetype == 0) { // called for safety, when delete themes
00874         theme_active = U.themes.first;
00875         theme_spacetype = SPACE_VIEW3D;
00876         theme_regionid = RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00877     }
00878     else {
00879         // later on, a local theme can be found too
00880         theme_active = U.themes.first;
00881         theme_spacetype = spacetype;
00882         theme_regionid = regionid;
00883     }
00884 }
00885 
00886 bTheme *UI_GetTheme()
00887 {
00888     return U.themes.first;
00889 }
00890 
00891 // for space windows only
00892 void UI_ThemeColor(int colorid)
00893 {
00894     const unsigned char *cp;
00895     
00896     cp = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid);
00897     glColor3ubv(cp);
00898 
00899 }
00900 
00901 // plus alpha
00902 void UI_ThemeColor4(int colorid)
00903 {
00904     const unsigned char *cp;
00905     
00906     cp = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid);
00907     glColor4ubv(cp);
00908 
00909 }
00910 
00911 // set the color with offset for shades
00912 void UI_ThemeColorShade(int colorid, int offset)
00913 {
00914     int r, g, b;
00915     const unsigned char *cp;
00916     
00917     cp = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid);
00918     r = offset + (int) cp[0];
00919     CLAMP(r, 0, 255);
00920     g = offset + (int) cp[1];
00921     CLAMP(g, 0, 255);
00922     b = offset + (int) cp[2];
00923     CLAMP(b, 0, 255);
00924     //glColor3ub(r, g, b);
00925     glColor4ub(r, g, b, cp[3]);
00926 }
00927 void UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(int colorid, int coloffset, int alphaoffset)
00928 {
00929     int r, g, b, a;
00930     const unsigned char *cp;
00931     
00932     cp = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid);
00933     r = coloffset + (int) cp[0];
00934     CLAMP(r, 0, 255);
00935     g = coloffset + (int) cp[1];
00936     CLAMP(g, 0, 255);
00937     b = coloffset + (int) cp[2];
00938     CLAMP(b, 0, 255);
00939     a = alphaoffset + (int) cp[3];
00940     CLAMP(a, 0, 255);
00941     glColor4ub(r, g, b, a);
00942 }
00943 
00944 // blend between to theme colors, and set it
00945 void UI_ThemeColorBlend(int colorid1, int colorid2, float fac)
00946 {
00947     int r, g, b;
00948     const unsigned char *cp1, *cp2;
00949     
00950     cp1 = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid1);
00951     cp2 = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid2);
00952 
00953     CLAMP(fac, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00954     r = floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[0] + fac * cp2[0]);
00955     g = floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[1] + fac * cp2[1]);
00956     b = floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[2] + fac * cp2[2]);
00957     
00958     glColor3ub(r, g, b);
00959 }
00960 
00961 // blend between to theme colors, shade it, and set it
00962 void UI_ThemeColorBlendShade(int colorid1, int colorid2, float fac, int offset)
00963 {
00964     int r, g, b;
00965     const unsigned char *cp1, *cp2;
00966     
00967     cp1 = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid1);
00968     cp2 = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid2);
00969 
00970     CLAMP(fac, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00971     r = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[0] + fac * cp2[0]);
00972     g = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[1] + fac * cp2[1]);
00973     b = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[2] + fac * cp2[2]);
00974     
00975     CLAMP(r, 0, 255);
00976     CLAMP(g, 0, 255);
00977     CLAMP(b, 0, 255);
00978     
00979     glColor3ub(r, g, b);
00980 }
00981 
00982 // blend between to theme colors, shade it, and set it
00983 void UI_ThemeColorBlendShadeAlpha(int colorid1, int colorid2, float fac, int offset, int alphaoffset)
00984 {
00985     int r, g, b, a;
00986     const unsigned char *cp1, *cp2;
00987     
00988     cp1 = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid1);
00989     cp2 = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid2);
00990 
00991     CLAMP(fac, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00992     r = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[0] + fac * cp2[0]);
00993     g = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[1] + fac * cp2[1]);
00994     b = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[2] + fac * cp2[2]);
00995     a = alphaoffset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[3] + fac * cp2[3]);
00996     
00997     CLAMP(r, 0, 255);
00998     CLAMP(g, 0, 255);
00999     CLAMP(b, 0, 255);
01000     CLAMP(a, 0, 255);
01001 
01002     glColor4ub(r, g, b, a);
01003 }

01026 
01027 // get the color, range 0.0-1.0
01028 void UI_GetThemeColor3fv(int colorid, float *col)
01029 {
01030     const unsigned char *cp;
01031     
01032     cp = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid);
01033     col[0] = ((float)cp[0]) / 255.0f;
01034     col[1] = ((float)cp[1]) / 255.0f;
01035     col[2] = ((float)cp[2]) / 255.0f;
01036 }
01037 
01038 // get the color, range 0.0-1.0, complete with shading offset
01039 void UI_GetThemeColorShade3fv(int colorid, int offset, float *col)
01040 {
01041     int r, g, b;
01042     const unsigned char *cp;
01043     
01044     cp = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid);
01045     
01046     r = offset + (int) cp[0];
01047     CLAMP(r, 0, 255);
01048     g = offset + (int) cp[1];
01049     CLAMP(g, 0, 255);
01050     b = offset + (int) cp[2];
01051     CLAMP(b, 0, 255);
01052     
01053     col[0] = ((float)r) / 255.0f;
01054     col[1] = ((float)g) / 255.0f;
01055     col[2] = ((float)b) / 255.0f;
01056 }
01057

01059 void UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(int colorid, unsigned char col[3])
01060 {

01062     
01063     cp = UI_ThemeGetColorPtr(theme_active, theme_spacetype, colorid);
01064     col[0] = cp[0];
01065     col[1] = cp[1];
01066     col[2] = cp[2];
01067 }

01081 void UI_GetThemeColorType4ubv(int colorid, int spacetype, char col[4])

01083     const unsigned char *cp;
01084

01091 
01092 // blends and shades between two char color pointers
01093 void UI_ColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(const unsigned char cp1[3], const unsigned char cp2[3], float fac, int offset)
01094 {
01095     int r, g, b;
01096     CLAMP(fac, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01097     r = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[0] + fac * cp2[0]);
01098     g = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[1] + fac * cp2[1]);
01099     b = offset + floorf((1.0f - fac) * cp1[2] + fac * cp2[2]);
01100 
01101     r = r < 0 ? 0 : (r > 255 ? 255 : r);
01102     g = g < 0 ? 0 : (g > 255 ? 255 : g);
01103     b = b < 0 ? 0 : (b > 255 ? 255 : b);
01104     
01105     glColor3ub(r, g, b);
01106 }
01107 
01108 void UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(const unsigned char cp[3], unsigned char col[3], int offset)
01109 {
01110     int r, g, b;
01111 
01112     r = offset + (int)cp[0];
01113     g = offset + (int)cp[1];
01114     b = offset + (int)cp[2];
01115 
01116     CLAMP(r, 0, 255);
01117     CLAMP(g, 0, 255);
01118     CLAMP(b, 0, 255);
01119 
01120     col[0] = r;
01121     col[1] = g;
01122     col[2] = b;
01123 }
01124 
01125 // get a 3 byte color, blended and shaded between two other char color pointers
01126 void UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(const unsigned char cp1[3], const unsigned char cp2[3], unsigned char col[3], float fac, int offset)
01127 {
01128     int r, g, b;
01129 
01130     CLAMP(fac, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01131     r = offset + floor((1.0f - fac) * cp1[0] + fac * cp2[0]);
01132     g = offset + floor((1.0f - fac) * cp1[1] + fac * cp2[1]);
01133     b = offset + floor((1.0f - fac) * cp1[2] + fac * cp2[2]);
01134 
01135     CLAMP(r, 0, 255);
01136     CLAMP(g, 0, 255);
01137     CLAMP(b, 0, 255);
01138 
01139     col[0] = r;
01140     col[1] = g;
01141     col[2] = b;
01142 }
01143 
01144 void UI_ThemeClearColor(int colorid)
01145 {
01146     float col[3];
01147     
01148     UI_GetThemeColor3fv(colorid, col);
01149     glClearColor(col[0], col[1], col[2], 0.0);
01150 }
01151 
01152 void UI_make_axis_color(const unsigned char src_col[3], unsigned char dst_col[3], const char axis)
01153 {
01154     switch (axis)
01155     {
01156         case 'X':
01157             dst_col[0] = src_col[0] > 219 ? 255 : src_col[0] + 36;
01158             dst_col[1] = src_col[1] < 26 ? 0 : src_col[1] - 26;
01159             dst_col[2] = src_col[2] < 26 ? 0 : src_col[2] - 26;
01160             break;
01161         case 'Y':
01162             dst_col[0] = src_col[0] < 46 ? 0 : src_col[0] - 36;
01163             dst_col[1] = src_col[1] > 189 ? 255 : src_col[1] + 66;
01164             dst_col[2] = src_col[2] < 46 ? 0 : src_col[2] - 36;
01165             break;
01166         case 'Z':
01167             dst_col[0] = src_col[0] < 26 ? 0 : src_col[0] - 26;
01168             dst_col[1] = src_col[1] < 26 ? 0 : src_col[1] - 26;
01169             dst_col[2] = src_col[2] > 209 ? 255 : src_col[2] + 46;
01170             break;
01171         default:
01172             BLI_assert(!"invalid axis arg");
01173     }
01174 }

01177 
01178 /* patching UserDef struct and Themes */
01179 void init_userdef_do_versions(void)
01180 {
01181     Main *bmain = G.main;
01182 //  countall();
01183     
01184     /* the UserDef struct is not corrected with do_versions() .... ugh! */
01185     if (U.wheellinescroll == 0) U.wheellinescroll = 3;
01186     if (U.menuthreshold1 == 0) {
01187         U.menuthreshold1 = 5;
01188         U.menuthreshold2 = 2;
01189     }
01190     if (U.tb_leftmouse == 0) {
01191         U.tb_leftmouse = 5;
01192         U.tb_rightmouse = 5;
01193     }
01194     if (U.mixbufsize == 0) U.mixbufsize = 2048;
01195     if (strcmp(U.tempdir, "/") == 0) {
01196         BLI_system_temporary_dir(U.tempdir);
01197     }
01198     if (U.autokey_mode == 0) {
01199         /* 'add/replace' but not on */
01200         U.autokey_mode = 2;
01201     }
01202     if (U.savetime <= 0) {
01203         U.savetime = 1;
01204 // XXX      error(STRINGIFY(BLENDER_STARTUP_FILE)" is buggy, please consider removing it.\n");
01205     }
01206     /* transform widget settings */
01207     if (U.tw_hotspot == 0) {
01208         U.tw_hotspot = 14;
01209         U.tw_size = 20;          // percentage of window size
01210         U.tw_handlesize = 16;    // percentage of widget radius
01211     }
01212     if (U.pad_rot_angle == 0)
01213         U.pad_rot_angle = 15;
01214     /* graph editor - unselected F-Curve visibility */
01215     if (U.fcu_inactive_alpha == 0) {
01216         U.fcu_inactive_alpha = 0.25f;
01217     }
01218     
01219     /* signal for derivedmesh to use colorband */
01220     /* run in case this was on and is now off in the user prefs [#28096] */
01221     vDM_ColorBand_store((U.flag & USER_CUSTOM_RANGE) ? (&U.coba_weight) : NULL);
01222 
01223     if (bmain->versionfile <= 191) {
01224         BLI_strncpy(U.plugtexdir, U.textudir, sizeof(U.plugtexdir));
01225         strcpy(U.sounddir, "/");
01226     }
01227     
01228     /* patch to set Dupli Armature */
01229     if (bmain->versionfile < 220) {
01230         U.dupflag |= USER_DUP_ARM;
01231     }
01232     
01233     /* added seam, normal color, undo */
01234     if (bmain->versionfile <= 234) {
01235         bTheme *btheme;
01236         
01237         U.uiflag |= USER_GLOBALUNDO;
01238         if (U.undosteps == 0) U.undosteps = 32;
01239         
01240         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01241             /* check for alpha==0 is safe, then color was never set */
01242             if (btheme->tv3d.edge_seam[3] == 0) {
01243                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.edge_seam, 230, 150, 50, 255);
01244             }
01245             if (btheme->tv3d.normal[3] == 0) {
01246                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.normal, 0x22, 0xDD, 0xDD, 255);
01247             }
01248             if (btheme->tv3d.vertex_normal[3] == 0) {
01249                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.vertex_normal, 0x23, 0x61, 0xDD, 255);
01250             }
01251             if (btheme->tv3d.face_dot[3] == 0) {
01252                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.face_dot, 255, 138, 48, 255);
01253                 btheme->tv3d.facedot_size = 4;
01254             }
01255         }
01256     }
01257     if (bmain->versionfile <= 235) {
01258         /* illegal combo... */
01259         if (U.flag & USER_LMOUSESELECT) 
01260             U.flag &= ~USER_TWOBUTTONMOUSE;
01261     }
01262     if (bmain->versionfile <= 236) {
01263         bTheme *btheme;
01264         /* new space type */
01265         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01266             /* check for alpha==0 is safe, then color was never set */
01267             if (btheme->ttime.back[3] == 0) {
01268                 // copied from ui_theme_init_default
01269                 btheme->ttime = btheme->tv3d;
01270                 rgba_char_args_set_fl(btheme->ttime.back,   0.45, 0.45, 0.45, 1.0);
01271                 rgba_char_args_set_fl(btheme->ttime.grid,   0.36, 0.36, 0.36, 1.0);
01272                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->ttime.shade1,  173, 173, 173, 255);      // sliders
01273             }
01274             if (btheme->text.syntaxn[3] == 0) {
01275                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->text.syntaxn,    0, 0, 200, 255);    /* Numbers  Blue*/
01276                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->text.syntaxl,    100, 0, 0, 255);    /* Strings  red */
01277                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->text.syntaxc,    0, 100, 50, 255);   /* Comments greenish */
01278                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->text.syntaxv,    95, 95, 0, 255);    /* Special */
01279                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->text.syntaxb,    128, 0, 80, 255);   /* Builtin, red-purple */
01280             }
01281         }
01282     }
01283     if (bmain->versionfile <= 237) {
01284         bTheme *btheme;
01285         /* bone colors */
01286         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01287             /* check for alpha==0 is safe, then color was never set */
01288             if (btheme->tv3d.bone_solid[3] == 0) {
01289                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.bone_solid, 200, 200, 200, 255);
01290                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.bone_pose, 80, 200, 255, 80);
01291             }
01292         }
01293     }
01294     if (bmain->versionfile <= 238) {
01295         bTheme *btheme;
01296         /* bone colors */
01297         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01298             /* check for alpha==0 is safe, then color was never set */
01299             if (btheme->tnla.strip[3] == 0) {
01300                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tnla.strip_select,   0xff, 0xff, 0xaa, 255);
01301                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tnla.strip, 0xe4, 0x9c, 0xc6, 255);
01302             }
01303         }
01304     }
01305     if (bmain->versionfile <= 239) {
01306         bTheme *btheme;
01307         
01308         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01309             /* Lamp theme, check for alpha==0 is safe, then color was never set */
01310             if (btheme->tv3d.lamp[3] == 0) {
01311                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.lamp,   0, 0, 0, 40);
01312 /* TEMPORAL, remove me! (ton) */                
01313                 U.uiflag |= USER_PLAINMENUS;
01314             }
01315             
01316         }
01317         if (U.obcenter_dia == 0) U.obcenter_dia = 6;
01318     }
01319     if (bmain->versionfile <= 241) {
01320         bTheme *btheme;
01321         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01322             /* Node editor theme, check for alpha==0 is safe, then color was never set */
01323             if (btheme->tnode.syntaxn[3] == 0) {
01324                 /* re-uses syntax color storage */
01325                 btheme->tnode = btheme->tv3d;
01326                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tnode.edge_select, 255, 255, 255, 255);
01327                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tnode.syntaxl, 150, 150, 150, 255);  /* TH_NODE, backdrop */
01328                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tnode.syntaxn, 129, 131, 144, 255);  /* in/output */
01329                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tnode.syntaxb, 127, 127, 127, 255);  /* operator */

01331                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tnode.syntaxc, 120, 145, 120, 255);  /* group */
01332             }
01333             /* Group theme colors */
01334             if (btheme->tv3d.group[3] == 0) {
01335                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.group, 0x0C, 0x30, 0x0C, 255);
01336                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.group_active, 0x66, 0xFF, 0x66, 255);
01337             }
01338             /* Sequence editor theme*/
01339             if (btheme->tseq.movie[3] == 0) {
01340                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.movie,  81, 105, 135, 255);
01341                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.image,  109, 88, 129, 255);
01342                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.scene,  78, 152, 62, 255);
01343                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.audio,  46, 143, 143, 255);
01344                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.effect,     169, 84, 124, 255);
01345                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.plugin,     126, 126, 80, 255);
01346                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.transition, 162, 95, 111, 255);
01347                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.meta,   109, 145, 131, 255);
01348             }
01349         }
01350         
01351         /* set defaults for 3D View rotating axis indicator */ 
01352         /* since size can't be set to 0, this indicates it's not saved in startup.blend */
01353         if (U.rvisize == 0) {
01354             U.rvisize = 15;
01355             U.rvibright = 8;
01356             U.uiflag |= USER_SHOW_ROTVIEWICON;
01357         }
01358         
01359     }
01360     if (bmain->versionfile <= 242) {
01361         bTheme *btheme;
01362         
01363         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01364             /* long keyframe color */
01365             /* check for alpha==0 is safe, then color was never set */
01366             if (btheme->tact.strip[3] == 0) {
01367                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.edge_sharp, 255, 32, 32, 255);
01368                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tact.strip_select,   0xff, 0xff, 0xaa, 204);
01369                 rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tact.strip, 0xe4, 0x9c, 0xc6, 204);
01370             }
01371             
01372             /* IPO-Editor - Vertex Size*/
01373             if (btheme->tipo.vertex_size == 0) {
01374                 btheme->tipo.vertex_size = 3;
01375             }
01376         }
01377     }
01378     if (bmain->versionfile <= 243) {
01379         /* set default number of recently-used files (if not set) */
01380         if (U.recent_files == 0) U.recent_files = 10;
01381     }
01382     if (bmain->versionfile < 245 || (bmain->versionfile == 245 && bmain->subversionfile < 3)) {
01383         bTheme *btheme;
01384         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01385             rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.editmesh_active, 255, 255, 255, 128);
01386         }
01387         if (U.coba_weight.tot == 0)
01388             init_colorband(&U.coba_weight, 1);
01389     }
01390     if ((bmain->versionfile < 245) || (bmain->versionfile == 245 && bmain->subversionfile < 11)) {
01391         bTheme *btheme;
01392         for (btheme = U.themes.first; btheme; btheme = btheme->next) {
01393             /* these should all use the same color */
01394             rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tv3d.cframe, 0x60, 0xc0, 0x40, 255);
01395             rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tipo.cframe, 0x60, 0xc0, 0x40, 255);
01396             rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tact.cframe, 0x60, 0xc0, 0x40, 255);
01397             rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tnla.cframe, 0x60, 0xc0, 0x40, 255);
01398             rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tseq.cframe, 0x60, 0xc0, 0x40, 255);
01399             //rgba_char_args_set(btheme->tsnd.cframe, 0x60, 0xc0, 0x40, 255); Not needed anymore
01400             rgba_char_args_set(btheme->ttime.cframe, 0x60, 0xc0, 0x40, 255);
01401         }
01402     }
01403     if ((bmain->versionfile < 245) || (bmain->versionfile == 245 && bmain->subversionfile < 13)) {
01404         bTheme *btheme;
